name: Dungeon Delver
description: You have significant experience exploring dangerous dungeons, caverns, and ruins, giving you the following benefits.

benefits.name: Trap Awareness
benefits.description: You have Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Intelligence (Investigation) checks made to detect or avoid traps.

benefits.name: Trap Resistance
benefits.description: You have Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

benefits.name: Surprise Proficiency
benefits.description: You have proficiency with the Perception skill.

benefits.name: Unassuming Blend
benefits.description: If you are in your natural underground environment, you can take the Hide action as a Bonus Action.
